傜字的基本解释

傜
yáo
同“徭”。

傜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáo］
［《廣韻》餘昭切，平宵，以。］
(1)同“徭”。劳役。
(2)我国少数民族名。即今瑶族。

傜字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第26
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?餘招切，音姚。【六書故】傜役也。亦作徭。又作繇。【揚子·方言】傜，衺也。自山而西，爲凡物細大不純者謂之傜。　又姓。漢更始將傜偉。　又莫傜。【隋書·地理志】長沙郡有夷䗺，名莫傜，自言其先祖有功，常免征役，故以爲名。【杜甫詩】莫傜射鴈鳴桑弓。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】傜，衺也。自山而西，凡物不能純者謂傜。〕　謹照原文改：爲凡物細大不純者謂之傜。
傜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傜字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Exquisite
yáo
Same as "徭".
Exquisite
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáo］
["Guangyun" Yu Zhaoqie, Ping Xiao, to. ]
(1) Same as "徭". Hard labor.
(2) The names of ethnic minorities in my country. Now the Yao nationality.
Exquisite
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傜; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113 26
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Zhaoqie, Yin Yao. [The Six Ancient Books] Dai Yi also. Also for misfortune. Make you again. 【Yangtze Dialect】傜，衺也. From the mountain to the west, it is called 傜 for those who are fine and impure.　Another last name. Han Geng began to general Wei Wei.　There is nothing wrong with it. [Book of Sui·Geography] Changsha County has a Yi Tu, whose name is Mo Kuo. He claimed that his ancestors were meritorious and often exempted from conscription, so he took his name. [Poem by Du Fu] Mo Xie shoots wild goose and sang bow. Textual research: [[Yangtze Dialect] Nuo, Na Ye. From Shan to West, everything cannot be pure. 〕 　 I would like to change it according to the original text: It is called 傜 for those who are small, large and impure.

2) повинность, барщина
傜赋 повинности и налоги, барщина и оброк
